info.title: Entity Store imdb
info.description: OpenAPI Specification for imdb entity store.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: (Optional) Specifies the number of records to skip before starting to return records from the query. Can be used along with limit property to implement pagination. Default value is 0 if not specified. The sort order is based on Id field.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional) Specifies the maximum number of records to read from service. Can be used along with start property to implement pagination. Default value is 100 if not specified. The maximum value can be 1000.

parameters.name: expansionLevel
parameters.description: (Optional) Specifies the depth of related records to be retrieved from the service. This property supports values from 1 to 3.

parameters.name: failOnFirst
parameters.description: (Optional) Specifies if Data Service should stop processing the remaining records when a record fails to process. If set to true, Data Service will stop processing records on the first failure. This property only supports Boolean values (true, false).

get.description: Downloads file from the specified field of an existing Actor record.

parameters.description: The Id of the record to retrieve/modify from Data Service.

parameters.name: fieldName
parameters.description: The name of the File field to modify for the specified record in entity $Actor. The name has to be a valid field and is case-sensitive.

TotalRecordCount.description: The total number of records matching the specified query filters in the service. Can be used with start and limit properties of QueryRequest to implement pagination.
The total number of records matching the specified query filters in the service. Can be used with start and limit properties of QueryRequest to implement pagination.
The total number of records matching the specified query filters in the service. Can be used with start and limit properties of QueryRequest to implement pagination.

selectedFields.description: (Optional) Specifies the list of fields to be returned for each record from the query. If left as null or the list is empty, all fields for the record will be returned. Default is null.

start.description: (Optional) Specifies the number of records to skip before starting to return records from the query. Can be used along with limit property to implement pagination. Default value is 0 if not specified. The default sort order is based on Id field, use sortOptions to change the sort order.

limit.description: (Optional) Specifies the maximum number of records to read from service. Can be used along with start property to implement pagination. Default value is 100 if not specified. The maximum value can be 1000.

sortOptions.description: (Optional) Specifies the list of fields used to sort returned records. The default sort order is based on Id field if sortOptions are not provided.

fieldName.description: Specifies the name of the field used to sort returned records. The name has to be a valid field and is case-sensitive.

logicalOperator.description: Specifies if All (AND) or Any (OR) filters and filter groups should be used to filter records. Use 0 for All (AND) and 1 for Any (OR). Default is 0.

fieldName.description: Specifies the name of the field for filter operation.

operator.description: Specifies the operator used for filter operation. Supported operators include: contains, not contains, startswith, endswith, =, !=, >, <, >=, <=, in, not in. Not all operators are supported for all field types.

value.description: Specifies the value to use for the filter operation. An empty value with '=' operator does a null check and with '!=' operator does a not null check.

UnauthorizedError.description: You are not authenticated to access Data Service. Make sure your Assistant or Robot is connected to a modern folder in your account.

ForbiddenError.description: You don't have permission to access the entity, field or record or you are using an unsupported robot type. Please contact your administrator for necessary permissions.
